self.description: URL to the current page of the listing

next.description: URL to the next page of the listing

prev.description: URL to the previous page of the listing

last.description: URL to the last page of the listing

first.description: URL to the first page of the listing

count.description: Number of items on the current listing

total_count.description: Number of all items matching the criteria

total_pages.description: Number of all pages containing items matching the criteria

purchasable.description: Indicates if any of Variants are in stock or backorderable

in_stock.description: Indicates if any of Variants are in stock

backorderable.description: Indicates if any of Variants are backeorderable

default_variant.description: The default Variant for given product

variants.description: List of Product Variants, excluding Master Variant

taxons.description: List of Taxons associated with Product

in_stock.description: Indicates if Variant is in stock

position.description: Sort order of images set in the Admin Panel

styles.description: An array of pre-scaled image styles

url.description: Absolute URL of the uploaded image in selected style (width/height)

is_root.description: Indicates if the Taxon is the root node of this Taxonomy tree

is_child.description: Returns true is this is a child node of this Taxonomy tree

is_leaf.description: Returns true if this is the end of a branch of this Taxonomy tree

products.description: List of active and available Products associated with this Taxon
